channel.title: Py Humble Books
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Books bundles!

item.title: Romantasy Dramatized Audiobooks Featuring Jeaniene Frost, K.F. Breene, & More!
item.description: A bundle of sexy supernatural love
item.content:encoded: Tempt your paranormal desires with this bundle of sexy fantasy romance audiobooks, including pitch-perfect adaptations of beloved novels from some of the most revered authors in the genre! In Jeaniene Frost’s Halfway To The Grave, you’ll join half-vampire Catherine Crawfield on a mission for revenge alongside an irresistible vampire partner whose motives seem mostly pure. Tempting Danger by Eileen Wilks stars Lily Yu, a detective investigating a series of murders that have “werewolf” written all over them, which puts her on a collision course with a sexy lycanthrope who appears eager to help. An Easy Death by Charlaine Harris (of True Blood fame) takes you to a fractured, alternate history United States where rogue wizards meet hardened gunslingers in an inventive Wild West setting. Pay what you want for this bundle of over 20 audiobooks and help support charity: water with your purchase!

item.title: Cyberpunk RED 2024 by R. Talsorian Games
item.content:encoded: Calling all solos, netrunners, and rockerboys—it’s time to bring the edgy allure and explosive excitement of the legendary Cyberpunk pen and paper RPG to your table! This bundle is bursting at the seams with all the rulebooks, sourcebooks, and more that you’ll need to play both Cyberpunk RED —the latest edition of the seminal RPG—as well as Cyberpunk 2020, the classic that started it all. You’ll get over 20 books and game aids for both editions, including the Interface RED Volume 3 sourcebook, packed with new weapons, gear, rules, and more, and available for the first time anywhere as part of this bundle! Pay what you want for all the tools you need to take Night City by storm, and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase.

item.title: Radiant Black & The Massiverse from Image
item.content:encoded: Dive into the Massive-Verse, the interconnected comic universe that bridges genres, artistic styles, and even mediums to offer some of the boldest superhero stories out there! This bundle, packed with 15 volumes, will get you up to speed on these essential stories. Start at the beginning with Radiant Black, which follows a down-on-his-luck 30 year old who discovers immense cosmic power… and its attendant perils. You’ll also get Inferno Radiant Red, Radiant Pink, Inferno Girl, and a ton more series collections and one-shots, serving as the perfect vehicle for immersion into this hot new universe. Pay what you want for this killer bundle and help support charity!

item.title: Game Design and Programming by Pearson
item.content:encoded: Start your journey into game development today with this bundle of books from Pearson, full of critical instruction for beginners and invaluable skill-up material for seasoned devs! Learn how to create compelling and profitable content for one of the hottest games around in Roblox Game Development in 24 Hours: The Official Roblox Guide. Bone up on the basics required to truly understand the craft in Fundamentals of Game Design. Empower yourself with the skills to create your own bespoke art assets with Learning Blender. Get all these books and more—a value of over $800—and help support Women Who Code with your purchase.

item.title: Kodansha Award-Winning (& Nominated) Manga
item.content:encoded: Get ready to discover your new favorite manga with this amazing bundle from Kodansha, full of fan-favorite titles that span the genres! In The Drops of God, you’ll witness the gripping human drama surrounding an inheritance battle over a wine collection worth millions. Nina the Starry Bride tells the captivating tale of an orphan turned princess navigating royal deceit and unexpected love. In Shangri-la Frontier, you’ll join a seasoned gamer as he faces formidable foes and mysterious figures in a captivating and deadly virtual world. Pay what you want for this incredible bundle packed with dozens of volumes and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation!

item.title: AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Development by O'Reilly
item.description: Cloud skills for data, IoT & more!
item.content:encoded: Learn how to leverage leading cloud platforms for mission critical tasks—from data science to smart device control—with this book bundle from O’Reilly! Architecting IoT Solutions on Azure will teach you about device management at scale and get you up to speed on Azure’s tools for building globally distributed systems. Data Science on the Google Cloud Platform shows you how to implement end-to-end data pipelines with cloud native tools through a series of hands-on projects. Pay what you want for these and more—a total of 15 books valued at almost $1,000—and helps support Code for America with your purchase.

item.title: Better Your Finances For Dummies
item.content:encoded: Need help getting your finances in order, building wealth, and setting yourself up for a secure future? These books in the popular For Dummies series are ready to come to the rescue! Investing in your 20s & 30s For Dummies is full of targeted investment advice for people early in their careers, designed to set you up for future success. Budgeting For Dummies takes the pain out of day-to-day finance, sharing the tools you’ll need to manage debt, improve your credit, and live your best life within your means. Investing in Stocks For Dummies demystifies this complex world, covering everything you need to to know invest wisely and grow your wealth. Pay what you want for this bundle full of expert-backed financial guidance and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Software Architecture by Packt
item.content:encoded: Developers of all disciplines, it’s time to take the lead and start creating software that’s cleaner, highly scalable, and more performant with this bundle of books on software architecture from Packt. The Software Architect's Handbook covers the design patterns, best practices, and paradigms for efficient software development, with an eye on performance, security, and big-picture decision making. Modern Computer Architecture and Organization will give you a thorough understanding of hardware down to the circuit level, covering modern architectures like 86, x64, ARM, and RISC-V. Pay what you want for over 20 books on this essential topic and help support Hello World with your purchase!

item.title: Terry Pratchett's Discworld by HarperCollins
item.content:encoded:
Discover Sir Terry Pratchett's Discworld, the beloved comic fantasy universe that’s brimming with wit, wisdom, and wonder. Start where it all began in the seminal novel The Color of Magic, which follows the misadventures of the inept wizard Rincewind as he serves as tour guide to Twoflower, Discworld's first-ever sightseer. The hapless duo’s journeys continue in The Light Fantastic and Sourcery, where the scale of world-threatening hazards (and accompanying absurdities) increase exponentially. You’ll get over 35 Discworld novels in all, touching all corners of this whimsical realm and all manner of its denizens, and you’ll help Room to Read with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

This bundle is only available to those in the US.
